snippet.title: Necroking | Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Necroking is coming on September 4th!

Necroking is a turn-based tactical roguelite featuring deep deckbuilding mechanics. Construct your skull deck, summon skeletons, and command the undead to eradicate life-corrupted settlements. Brace yourself to unleash the full power of necromancy and ascend to your rightful throne as the terrifying Necroking.

Wishlist Necroking on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2852980/Necroking/
Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/alawar
